step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your shoulders are relaxed and not hunched.
Excellent! Now, stretch your fingers wide open. Focus on extending through your fingertips to maximize the stretch.
Great job opening your hand wide. Remember to keep your arm extended overhead throughout this movement.
Nicely done! Make a tight fist while inhaling and engaging your arm muscles. Visualize the fluid moving.
Second rep, looking good! Maintain that straight arm overhead and relaxed shoulders as you prepare to open your hand.
Perfect! Open your hand and fingers wide again, really reaching. Keep the arm extended.
Excellent opening of the hand. Continue to focus on the overhead arm position and the feeling of resistance.
Fantastic finish! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Open your hand wide, then make a tight fist while inhaling. Continue visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm.
